item.title: "MP DK Aruna Leads Grand Ambedkar Jayanti Celebrations in Palamuru". Hans News Service Gadwal. Farooq Abdullah on Pahalgam attack fallout: ‘India is safe in the hands of Modi’
item.description:
<![CDATA[New Delhi: Jammu and Kashmir National Conference President, Farooq Abdullah on Friday strongly condemned the recent terror attack in J&K’s Pahalgam and called for strict action against the perpetrators of the massacre of 26 innocent civilians. He also asserted that India was safe in the hands of Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
In an interview with IANS, Abdullah spoke about Pakistan’s role in terrorism and demanded strict action against those involved in the recent Pahalgam attack. He also discus...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
